Author: aaroneous
Content:
Supposedly they're converting all the YouTube videos to h.264, and the iPhone has a YouTube app for playing all those videos.

But, I can't understand why you'd want to put the music industry to death?

Author: a_mythical_bird
Content:
1) Hack the Ipone and enable Flash

2) Listen to Youtube videos all day

No more need for any other media.

Author: a_mythical_bird
Title: Put the music industry to death. Step by Step instructions.
